description:
YouTube and YouTube Music in a single app. No ads, plays in the background. YouTube and YouTube Music in a single app. No ads, plays in the background.
  • Manage watchlist, music library without login
  • Manage watch history without login
  • Hide shorts
  • Live chat
  • Play original audio

How it works

  • Wrap https://m.youtube.com and https://music.youtube.com in Android webview
  • Inject code to block ads
  • Hook playback controls and support playing in background

    • Desktop version

    Desktop version shares the same code base with mobile version. Download Linux/macOS/Windows version from NouTube-Desktop.
